Weapon.name: B-N84
Weapon.description: A weapon capable of dealing Direct Damage. This model excels in rapid fire.

Weapon.name: 1191.45-Auto
Weapon.description: A weapon capable of dealing Direct Damage. This model excels in HP breakage.

Weapon.name: SG-B226
Weapon.description: A weapon capable of dealing Direct Damage. This model excels in magazine size.

Weapon.name: LP-09
Weapon.description: A weapon capable of dealing Direct Damage. This model excels in charge speed.

Weapon.name: Z-40
Weapon.attained: Chapter 15 'This Gun's for You!' optional mission.
Weapon.description: A weapon capable of dealing Direct Damage. This model excels in charge acceleration.

Weapon.name: MI50A
Weapon.attained: Arena Exchange for 500 Copper, 200 Silver, and 50 Gold Coins.
Weapon.description: A weapon capable of dealing Direct Damage. This model exceeds in attack power.

Weapon.name: B-N84 Golden
Weapon.attained: First hex in Primary Gate in Neverland.
Weapon.description: One of the three Golden Handguns. Excels in all regards, especially fire rate.

Weapon.name: 1191.45 Golden
Weapon.description: One of the three Golden Handguns. Excels in all regards, especially power.

Weapon.name: SG-B226 Golden
Weapon.description: One of the three Golden Handguns. Excels in all regards, especially capacity.

Weapon.name: SMG-05
Weapon.description: A weapon capable of dealing Scratch Damage. This model excels in rapid fire.

Weapon.name: PDW-XN.V2
Weapon.description: A weapon capable of dealing Scratch Damage. This model excels in charge speed.

Weapon.name: NP.05C
Weapon.attained: Shop at Ebel City for 300,000, during and after Chapter 12.
Weapon.description: A weapon capable of dealing Scratch Damage. This model excels in charge acceleration.

Weapon.name: PDW-XN.V3
Weapon.description: A weapon capable of dealing Scratch Damage. This model excels in magazine size.

Weapon.name: NP.05 Golden
Weapon.description: A gleaming Golden Machinegun. It excels in all regards.

Weapon.name: First Aid Kit
Weapon.description: Never leave home without medical supplies! Equip it to use healing items in combat.

Weapon.name: Grenade Box
Weapon.description: A padded case for transporting explosives. Equip it to use attack items in combat.

Weapon.name: Magazine Case
Weapon.description: Various forms of ammo fit in this hard case. Equip it to use specialty rounds in combat.

Parts.name: Rookie Sight
Parts.purchase: Shop at Albona during Chapter 7 and later.

Parts.name: Long Scope Elite
Parts.purchase: Arena exchange for 300 Copper, 60 Silver, and 3 Gold Coins.

Parts.name: HG Rookie Barrel
Parts.purchase: Shop at Albona during Chapter 7 and later.

Parts.name: MG Rookie Barrel
Parts.purchase: Shop at Albona during Chapter 7 and later.

Parts.name: Rookie Grip
Parts.purchase: Shop at Albona during Chapter 7 and later.

Parts.name: HG Rookie Magazine
Parts.purchase: Shop at Albona during Chapter 7 and later.

Parts.name: MG Rookie Magazine
Parts.purchase: Shop at Albona during Chapter 7 and later.

Parts.name: MG Magazine +12
Parts.purchase: Arena exchange for 200 Copper, 40 Silver, and 1 Gold Coin.

Mission.title: Pest Extermination
Mission.Notes: Assassination of enemies on 1 single red hex on Level 4.

Mission.title: The Garden Party
Mission.Notes: Receive a flower and red hexes from doorman. Next Story mission begins.

Mission.title: A Battlefield Revisited
Mission.Notes: Use red hexes to clear a path on level 4 to the elevator down to level 6 and to Lucia, then fight all the way through until the end.

Mission.title: Power Station Checkup
Mission.Notes: Using a red hex from the story mission, and normal hexes for the rest, clear a path to the Hughes Power Station.

Mission.title: An Act of Kindness

Client.name: Daniel
Client.location: Ebel City near the Shop (daytime) - Level 4

Mission.Notes: In the top-left corner of Leanne's room can be found a Bongo the Clown doll. Give to Daniel.

Mission.title: Blackout
Mission.Notes: Defeat the boss at Hughes Power Station on Level 4.

Mission.title: A Father Attacked
Mission.Notes: Defeat enemy on Level 4, around Cafe.

Challenge.Notes: Between Forest of Idols and one terminal.
To right of Forest of Idols, looking at it from the entrance.
Only one in Silver Canyon area.
Near Cranktown, towards lift to level 6.
Between Forest of Idols and two terminals.
Above and to the right of Forest of Idols, looking at the entrance.
